TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataPagerField extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class DataPagerField Implements IStateManager
public ref class DataPagerField abstract : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 用作数据页导航字段类型的基类，这些类型表示 控件的导航控件。

span.span: Serves as the base class for data pager field types, which represent a navigation control for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作所有数据页导航字段类型的基类。The class serves as the base class for all data pager field types. 数据页导航字段由控件用来表示导航控件。Data pager fields are used by the control to represent a navigation control. 使用派生自的类来选择在控件中显示的页导航类型。Use the classes that are derived from to select which type of pager is displayed in the control. 下表列出了可用的数据页导航字段类型。The following table lists available data pager field types. |页导航字段类型Pager field type|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||允许用户一次浏览数据页, 或跳转到第一页或最后一页。Lets users navigate through data pages one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page.| ||允许用户按页码选择页。Lets users select a page by page number.| ||使页面开发人员能够创建自定义分页 UI。Lets page developers create a custom paging UI.| 可以从类派生, 以创建更多的页导航字段类型。You can derive from the class to create additional pager field types. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用、 和 对象在控件中显示页面导航控件。The following example shows how to use , , and objects to display page navigation controls in a control. 对象是从类派生的。The objects are derived from the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/CS/DataPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/VB/DataPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

block.para:
从类继承时, 必须重写以下成员:When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: -

- . - .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于类是抽象类, 因此不能直接创建对象。 Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 此构造函数通常由派生类的构造函数调用, 用于初始化类中定义的属性。This constructor is typically called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties that are defined in the class.

span.span: Creates a copy of the current object that is derived from .
A copy of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一个帮助器方法, 该方法由方法用来创建派生自的当前对象的副本。 The method is a helper method that is used by the method to create a copy of the current object that is derived from . 若要创建当前对象的副本, 方法首先使用方法创建对象的新实例。To create a copy of the current object, the method first creates a new instance of a object by using the method. 然后, 它会调用方法来复制当前对象的属性值。Then it calls the method to copy the property values of the current object.

span.span: The target page number.

summary.span: 创建一个 URL，该 URL 包含具有指定页码的查询字符串字段。

span.span: Creates a URL that contains a query string field that has the specified page number.
The target URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和页导航字段使用 方法为页导航字段的每个按钮创建目标URL。 The method is used by the and pager fields to create the target URL for each button of the pager field. 目标 URL 包含包含名称/值对的查询字符串字段。The target URL includes a query string field that contains a name/value pair. 名称是属性的值, 值表示的`pageNumber`值。The name is the value of the property, and the value represents the value of `pageNumber`.

ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object)
abstract member LoadViewState : obj -> unit override this.LoadViewState : obj -> unit

param.name: savedState
param.span: 保存的该控件的视图状态值。

span.span: The saved view-state values for the control.

summary.span: 还原以前保存的视图状态信息。

span.span: Restores view-state information that was saved previously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在上一个页面请求期间还原由 方法保存的对象的视图状态信息。 The method restores view-state information for the object that was saved by the method during a previous page request. 此方法主要由[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基础结构使用, 不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过, 控件开发人员可以重写此方法, 以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnFieldChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnFieldChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将引发一个事件, 该事件指示对象的状态已更改。The method raises an event that indicates that the state of the object has changed. 更改属性将导致引发此事件。Changes to the property cause this event to be raised. 更改派生类型中的属性也会在状态发生更改时引发此事件。Changes to properties in derived types also raise this event when state changes occur. 使用方法, 派生类可以处理事件, 而无需附加委托。The method enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property bool QueryStringHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.QueryStringHandled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已对查询字符串字段进行计算。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the query string field has been evaluated.

value.span: 如果已经对查询字符串字段进行计算，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the query string field has been evaluated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和页导航字段使用属性来确定是否已对查询字符串字段进行计算。 The and pager fields use the property to determine whether the query string field has been evaluated. 如果 为`false`, 则页导航字段类处理包含在 "查询字符串" 字段中的页码。If is `false`, the pager field class processes the page number that is contained in the query string field. 它还会更新控件的页属性。It also updates the page properties of the control. 仅当属性不是空字符串或`null`时, 页导航字段类才使用此属性。The pager field class uses this property only when the property is not an empty string or `null`.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property QueryStringValue As String
protected: property System::String ^ QueryStringValue { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从请求的 URL 获取查询字符串字段的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the query string field from the URL of the request.
The value of the query string field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性不是空字符串或`null`时, 控件将使用 HTTP GET 命令在页面中导航。 When the property is not an empty string or `null`, the control uses the HTTP GET command to navigate through the pages. 包含名称/值对的查询字符串字段将添加到页面的 URL 中。A query string field that consists of a name/value pair is added to the URL of the page. 属性从请求的 URL 中检索查询字符串字段的值。The property retrieves the value of the query string field from the URL of the request. 属性包含请求的页码。The property contains the requested page number. 此属性由和页导航字段用于计算所请求数据页的第一条记录的索引。This property is used by the and pager fields to evaluate the index of the first record for the page of data requested. 然后更新控件的页属性。The page properties of the control are then updated.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object

summary.span: 保存对 对象的视图状态所做的更改。

span.span: Saves the changes that were made to the object's view state.
The view-state changes for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有与对象关联的视图状态, 则此方法将返回`null`。If there is no view state associated with the object, the method returns `null`. 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily used by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Web.UI.IStateManager.TrackViewState() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪其视图状态更改，以便这些更改可以存储在控件的 属性中并在同一页的不同请求间保留。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so that they can be stored in the control's property and persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口方法调用方法。The interface method invokes the method. 这包含实际的实现, 并可由控件开发人员扩展。This contains the actual implementation and can be extended by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed
abstract member TrackViewState : unit -> unit override this.TrackViewState : unit -> unit

summary.span: 使 对象跟踪其视图状态更改，以便这些更改可以存储在控件的 属性中并在同一页的不同请求间保留。

span.span: Causes the object to track changes to its view state so that they can be stored in the control's property and persisted across requests for the same page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在`true`内部 将属性设置为, 并调用对象的方法。 The method internally sets the property to `true` and invokes the method for the object.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ViewState As StateBag
protected: property System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ ViewState { System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原 对象的视图状态。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that enables you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 一个包含 视图状态信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据页导航字段的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。A data pager field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要在同一页的 HTTP 请求之间保留值, ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性来存储属性值。To preserve values across HTTP requests for the same page, ASP.NET server controls use this property to store the property values. 值存储在页面上的 HTML 隐藏输入元素中。The values are stored in an HTML hidden input element on the page. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 视图状态概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818). 默认情况下, 将为所有服务器控件启用视图状态, 但在某些情况下, 你可能希望禁用该状态。By default, view state is enabled for all server controls, but there are circumstances when you might want to disable it. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 有关字典以及如何使用它们的详细信息, 请参阅[集合和数据结构](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](~/docs/standard/collections/index.md).

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

if the is rendered; otherwise, .
